org.opends.sdk
Interface ResultHandler<S extends Result,P>

Type Parameters:
S - The type of result handled by this result handler.
P - The type of the additional parameter to this handler's methods. Use Void for visitors that do not need an additional parameter.
public interface ResultHandler<S extends Result,P>

A completion handler for consuming the result of an asynchronous operation.

Connection objects allow a result completion handler to be specified when sending operation requests to a Directory Server. The handleResult(P, S) method is invoked when the operation completes successfully. The handleErrorResult(P, org.opends.sdk.ErrorResultException) method is invoked if the operation fails.

Implementations of these methods should complete in a timely manner so as to avoid keeping the invoking thread from dispatching to other completion handlers.

Method Summary
 void handleErrorResult(P p, ErrorResultException error)
          Invoked when the asynchronous operation has failed.
 void handleResult(P p, S result)
          Invoked when the asynchronous operation has completed successfully.
 

Method Detail

                       ErrorResultException error)
Invoked when the asynchronous operation has failed.

Parameters:
p - A handler specified parameter.
error - The error result exception indicating why the asynchronous operation has failed.

handleResult

void handleResult(P p,
                  S result)
Invoked when the asynchronous operation has completed successfully.

Parameters:
p - A handler specified parameter.
result - The result of the asynchronous operation.
